Ingredients: extra-virgin olive oil:2 tablespoons,diced yellow onion:1 medium onion,diced celery:1 large celery rib,diced carrots:1 large carrot,minced garlic:4 large cloves,peeled and chopped potatoes:1 large baking potato,red lentils:1.5 cups,vegetable broth:2 quarts,ground cumin:2 teaspoons,smoked paprika:1 teaspoon,ancho chili powder:1/2 teaspoon,ground black pepper:1/2 teaspoon,cayenne pepper:1/4 teaspoon,turmeric:1/4 teaspoon,freshly squeezed lemon juice:2 tablespoons,
Instructions:
1: Heat a large saucepan or small stockpot over medium to medium-high heat. Once hot, add the oil. When oil starts to shimmer, stir in the onion, celery, and carrot. Cook for 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in garlic and cook for 2 minutes more, stirring occasionally. Add the potato, lentils, and vegetable broth. Turn up heat to medium-high and bring to a boil. Then turn heat down to medium-low and stir in cumin, ancho chili powder, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and turmeric. Cover and simmer until all the vegetables are very tender, about 40 to 50 minutes. 2: Using an immersion blender, carefully puree the soup right in the pot, until no chunks of vegetables remain. Or carefully transfer hot soup, in batches, to a blender to blend until smooth - and then return the soup back to the pot. Stir in lemon juice. Taste test and season with salt, if needed.""
Mac and Cheese"
column4: unsalted butter:3 tablespoons,flour:2 tablespoons,canned evaporated milk:1 12oz can,half and half:1 cup,onion powder:1 tablespoon,garlic powder:2 teaspoons,creole seasoning:1 teaspoon,cayenne pepper:1/4 teaspoon,grated mozzarella cheese:1/2 cup,grated sharp cheddar cheese:1/2 cup,jack cheese:1/2 cup,Salt and pepper:to taste,uncooked macaroni:8 ounces,
column5: 1: Add butter to skillet, as soon as butter melts whisk in flour. Continue whisking until flour is fully mixed with butter. Then cook for about a minute to get rid of the flour taste. 2: Slowly add evaporated milk a little at the time, followed by the half and half ; you do not want the mixture to form any lumps. Simmer for about 3-5 minutes until mixture thickens slightly. 3: Add seasonings, onion and garlic powder, creole seasoning and cayenne pepper. 4: Bring to a simmer and let it simmer gently for about 2 minutes. 5: Stir in the cheeses (reserve some as toppings later), and continue stirring until everything’s melted and evenly combined and smooth. Salt & pepper, to taste. 6: Add the cooked  pasta to the pot, stir to evenly incorporate. Transfer the pasta mixture into a the pan or into a lightly greased 2-qt. baking dish; top with remaining cheese. 7: Bake at 375 Degrees F° for 20 minutes or until golden and bubbly."

Ingredients: fresh uncooked sweet corn husked and cut from cob:4 1/2 cups (6 ears),diced red onion:1 cup,diced avocado:1 large avocado,lime juice:1 lime or about 3 Tablespoons,chopped fresh basil:1/4 cup,sea salt:1 teaspoon,Ground pepper: to taste,
Instructions: Prep salad: After husking and cutting corn from the cob, pull out as many corn silks as possible. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Serve: Serve immediately or allow it to marinate for a few hours."
